/* No context defined for this component. */
  • Content: 
    'use strict';

const slick = require('slick-carousel-browserify');

PL.slider = {
    init: () => {
        const haveSlider = $('.pl-slider').length;

        if(haveSlider){
            slick($('.pl-slider'), {
                dots: true,
                speed: 500,
                slidesToShow: 1,
                slidesToScroll: 1,
                prevArrow: '<button class="prev">Previous Slide</button>',
                nextArrow: '<button class="next">Next Slide</button>'
            });
        }
    }
};

module.exports = PL.slider;
  • URL: /components/raw/slider/_slider.js
  • Filesystem Path: pattern-library/patterns/01-components/slider/_slider.js
  • Size: 546 Bytes
  • Content: 
    .slider {
    position: relative;
    
    .slick-arrow {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        text-indent: -999999rem;
        height: px-to-rem(40px);
        width: px-to-rem(40px);
        background-color: $white;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
        border-radius: px-to-rem(3px);
        opacity: 0.5;
        margin-bottom: 0;
        transition: all .25s ease;

        &:hover, &:focus {
            opacity: 1;
            border: 2px solid $gray;
        }
    }

    .prev {
        left: 0;
        z-index: 1;
        @include arrow('left', $black);
    }

    .next {
        right: 0;
        @include arrow('right', $black);
    }

    .slick-dots {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        list-style: none;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        margin-bottom: 0;

        li {
            height: px-to-rem(6px);
            margin-right: px-to-rem(10px);

            &:last-of-type {
                margin-right: 0;
            }
        }

        button {
            text-indent: -999999rem;
            padding: 0;
            height: px-to-rem(6px);
            width: px-to-rem(6px);
            background-color: $gray;
            border-radius: 50%;
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .slick-active {
            height: px-to-rem(10px);

            button {
                height: px-to-rem(10px);
                width: px-to-rem(10px);
                background-color: $vidaLoca;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        .slick-arrow {
            padding: 0;
            height: px-to-rem(56px);
            width: px-to-rem(56px);
            border-radius: 50%;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }
    }
}
  • URL: /components/raw/slider/_slider.scss

  • Preview:

  • Filesystem Path: pattern-library/patterns/01-components/slider/slider.hbs

Purpose

This component exists to house styles for all of the sliders. The JS only serves as an example of how the slider works and is only used in pattern-lib.js, which means it should not be included in megafood.js.

The .pl-slider class exists to ensure the JS doesnâ€™t conflict with other .slider classes in use, since this JS is only loading in the PL.
